title: PHOTRON LIMITED Announces Acquisition of AOS Technologies AG
summary: TOKYO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--PHOTRON LIMITED, a global leader in high-speed and scientific imaging solutions, today announced its acquisition of AOS Technologies AG, a Swiss-based designer and manufacturer of advanced high-speed imaging systems serving automotive, aerospace, industrial, and defense markets.
